entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 03:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -24.1°C
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -26.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:47 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:47 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 01:47 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
